nodes.bodyText:
why are these strings stored within code and not with other app content in branding.plist?
also there is a LocalizableString.txt that was not updated here.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -15,6 +15,10 @@ enum LocalizableString: String {
 
   // MARK: Resources
   case resourceNotAvailable = "This resource is currently unavailable."
+  case leaveStudy = "Leave Study"
+  case aboutStudy = "About the Study"
+  case consentPDF = "Consent PDF"
+  case leaveSubtitle = "This will also delete your app account."

nodes.bodyText:
The App wasn't supporting localization, I initialized it lately for contributors and trying to put all the hardcoded string in this file.
LocalizableString.txt was a dummy file added for reference and it's not been used and won't get called.
leaveStudy  & consentPDF is picked from branding and I shouldn't be adding them here, which I'll remove. Do you also want me to set up leaveSubtitle as part of branding?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -15,6 +15,10 @@ enum LocalizableString: String {
 
   // MARK: Resources
   case resourceNotAvailable = "This resource is currently unavailable."
+  case leaveStudy = "Leave Study"

+  case consentPDF = "Consent PDF"
+  case leaveSubtitle = "This will also delete your app account."
